definition[0]: if you amass money, knowledge, information etc, you gradually collect a large amount of it
example[0]: For 25 years, Darwin amassed evidence to support his theories.
example[1]: He amassed a fortune after the war.
definition[1]: to collect a large amount of something gradually over a period of time, especially money or information
example[2]: She has amassed a £94 million fortune through her family’s hotel and banking chain.
